languages.text: Отталкивает противника на 3 клетки, если тот не сумеет пройти проверку Ловкости на сопротивление.

traits.locale_text: Отталкивает противника на 3 клетки, если тот не сумеет пройти проверку Ловкости на сопротивление.

languages.text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.
languages.original_text: Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала ее {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} на 3 клетки.

traits.locale_text: The target must pass an Agility resistance test or be pushed 3 cells away.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.

languages.text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 3 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itilir{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.

traits.locale_text: Hedef, Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 3 hücre uzağa itilir.

languages.text: El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no ser {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujado{/g} a 3 casillas de distancia.
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad para no ser empujado a 3 casillas de distancia.

languages.text: 受到攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}3格。
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.

traits.locale_text: 受到攻击的目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会被推开3格。

languages.text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi elle est {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussée{/g} de 3 cases.
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.

traits.locale_text: La cible doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité, sans quoi elle est repoussée de 3 cases.

languages.text: ターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると3セル分{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばされる{/g}。
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} 3 cells away.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは、敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると3セル分突き飛ばされる。
ターゲットは、敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると3セル分突き飛ばされる。

languages.text: Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 3 Felder {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückgeworfen{/g} zu werden.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, um nicht 3 Felder zurückgeworfen zu werden.
